metadata.description: When a time travelling Nazi secret agent wants to steal a Foo Fighter from the US military, who does he hire? A squadron of Roman Centurions of course. It's up to Miss Fury to stop a UFO falling into the hands of evil, and her battle will very quickly go from a rainy New York to the bomber-filled skies over war ravaged Europe. Hang on for your life!!
metadata.name: Miss Fury Digital: Into Hades
